sentences.sentence: The next game will be a real test of their mettle.
sentences.translation: 下一场比赛就要看他们的拼搏精神了。

sentences.sentence: His first important chance to show his mettle came when he opened the new session of the legislature.
sentences.translation: 当他主持召开新一届立法会议的时候，让他显示魄力的第一次重要机会来了。

sentences.sentence: Each and every one of these soldiers has proved his mettle.
sentences.translation: 这些战士个个都是好样的。
